thread.title: Freindly and comfortable Hotel near the Moulin Rouge
thread.title_full: Freindly and comfortable Hotel near the Moulin Rouge - Review of Hotel Mercure Paris Pigalle Sacre-Coeur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 938ChrisB938
title: Freindly and comfortable Hotel near the Moulin Rouge
text: We chose this Hotel for its location but was delighted to find the place friendly and comfortable. The staff were helpful and the lounge fine. The rooms of good size and well appointed. Ten Euro Taxi ride from Garde Du Nord Station so just right for any stay in Montmartre.
